param.name: default_id
param.label: Select A Menu Item
param.description: The selection will determine what menu item is associated with this component by default. As a result, this will determine the default modules to be loaded on the page.

param.name: api_key
param.label: Google Maps API Key
param.description: In order for the Google Maps to function you must obtain an API Key. You can sign up for a key at http://code.google.com/apis/maps/signup.html
